# zoomFactor(for:)

**Instance Method**

Called when the zoom factor of the tab is needed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func zoomFactor(for context: WKWebExtensionContext) -> Double
```

## Parameters

- **context**: The context in which the web extension is running.

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView/pageZoom] of the tab’s web view if not implemented.

## Related Documentation

- **setZoomFactor(_:for:completionHandler:)**: Called to set the zoom factor of the tab.
